message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase my product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm willing to pay a maximum of $17,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $18,500?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $17,750. Can you consider this price?
